titleStmt.title: A pleasaunt disport of diuers noble personages: written in Italian by M. Iohn Bocace Florentine and poet laureat: in his boke vvhich is entituled Philocopo. And nowe Englished by H. G.
Filocolo. English
titleStmt.author: Boccaccio, Giovanni, 1313-1375.
Gifford, Humphrey.
Grantham, Henry, fl. 1571-1587.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Pater Noster Rowe, at the signe of the Marmayd, by H. Bynneman, for Richard Smyth and Nicholas England.,

notesStmt.note: H.G. = Humphrey Gifford or Henry Grantham.
Imperfect; title page cut affecting text; facsimile title page inserted previous to leaf 1.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
